Okay, here's the information for the Mazda 3 Hatchback (2015-2020), formatted as requested. I've used the preferred sources and the search terms provided. Note that data can vary slightly based on the specific model year and trim; I've aimed for the most common/base-level figures.

Year: 2015
BodyType: Hatchback
Cost: ~$18,995 (Based on Kelley Blue Book fair purchase price for a 2015 Mazda 3 Hatchback, varies by condition and location)
Length: 175.6 inches
CargoRear: 20.2 cubic feet
CargoTotal: 47.1 cubic feet
MpgCity: 29
MpgHwy: 41
MpgCombo: 33
FuelType: Gasoline
Drive: FWD
Reliability: 4.0 out of 5 (Based on Kelley Blue Book)
